item.title: About
item.description: My name is Hassan BASSI, Software Engineer from Casablanca, Morocco with a degree in Computer Science. I work at @xHub as Full Stack Software Developer . My main focus is on JVM Ecosystem’s and Web Frontend , And also experimenting new architectures and clean code . I’m located in Casablanca . Don’t hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions or some projects to collaborate .
